Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to prohibited debt collection practices during a disaster emergency
Summary: Relates to prohibited debt collection practices during a disaster emergency including the collection of debts, the enforcement of judgments and the disclosure of information affecting the debtor's credit worthiness.
LawCode: Add ยง601-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibited debt collection practices during a disaster emergency
